content.p: Sooda comes with the following tools. Click on a tool name for reference.

ul.li: SoodaStubGen - creates a set of source files and embedded resources which need to be compiled together to produce the DAL assembly.
SoodaSchemaTool - manipulates schema definitions, generates SQL scripts from schema definition.
SoodaQuery - interactive SOQL query analyzer tool.
SoodaCompileStubs - precompiles stubs into a separate assembly (useful for very large schemas to speed up the compilation process)
SoodaFixKeygen - generates SQL code to update the key generator table.
